channel.title: [508] Map Problem [508]

item.title: [508] Map Problem [508]
item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

Hey everyone im currently working on a Pali based 508 server. I am trying to perfect the map that loads when you click the map icon in the top right corner. It loads perfectly and functions 100% until I want to close it out. The interface closes out but for some reason the ground and everything else turns black and i can’t click anywhere to move. The NPC’s around me are still there but when i click attack or anything else on them it does nothing… The only way to fix it it is to log out completely.Has anyone found a fix for this. In my Actionbuttons.java I have placed this code.

case 755: //Close the world map if (buttonId == 9) { p.frames.setMapRegion(p); p.frames.removeOverlay(p); p.frames.removeShownInterface(p); } break;

Read full topic
